segments.text: Whoa ! This is a massive flea market !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You're telling me ! There are thousands of people here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And hundreds of booths-all filled with different kinds of stuff .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is almost like a Taiwanese night market ! I can't believe it !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You can't buy much more , Wei ! You already have enough to fill two boxes to send back to Taiwan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yeah . OK . I'll just buy smallthings !
segments.speaker: S2
